item.title: Amazon Prime Videoが広告ティアをデフォルトにしたことで、広告主がテレビ放送局とどのように取引しているかが明らかになり、その巨大なスケールでライバルを脅かす可能性がある（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:

Amazon Prime Video's move to make the ad tier its default could unravel how advertisers deal with TV broadcasters and scare off rivals with its massive scale  —  On Jan. 29, Prime Video will make its ad tier the default for its tens of millions of subscribers, a move that could unravel …

item.title: ミックステープ・プラットフォームDatPiff、2023年3月にサーバークラッシュを経験した後、36万6420本のミックステープと無料アルバムの50TBキャッシュをInternet Archiveにアップロード（Andre Gee/Rolling Stone）
item.description:
Andre Gee / Rolling Stone:
Mixtape platform DatPiff uploads its 50TB cache of 366,420 mixtapes and free albums to the Internet Archive, after experiencing a server crash in March 2023  —  DatPiff uploaded its extensive free mixtape catalog to the Internet Archive to protect it for the foreseeable future

item.title: ESPNがパット・マカフィーを "ネズミ "呼ばわりした幹部への処分を見送ったことで、ケーブルからストリーミングへの移行に伴うパワーシフトが浮き彫りに（Kevin Draper/New York Times）
item.description:
Kevin Draper / New York Times:
ESPN deciding not to punish Pat McAfee for publicly calling an executive a “rat” highlights a power shift as the network transitions from cable to streaming  —  For decades, the biggest star at ESPN was ESPN.  That's changing as it transitions from cable dominance to a much less certain streaming future.

item.title: カリフォルニアの公共ラジオ局KCRWが、300万ドルの財政赤字削減のため、約16人の雇用を削減し、Greater LAポッドキャストを終了。
item.description:
Los Angeles Times:
California public radio station KCRW cuts about 16 jobs by offering buyouts and ends its Greater LA podcast, in a bid to reduce a projected $3M budget deficit  —  Santa Monica public radio station KCRW will part ways with more than a dozen staffers and end the popular podcast “Greater LA.”

item.title: Netflixの広告担当プレジデント、エイミー・ラインハードによると、広告ティアのMAUは全世界で2,300万人以上、広告ティアを利用している顧客の85％が1日2時間以上ストリーミングを利用しているとのこと（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Netflix President of Advertising Amy Reinhard says its ad tier has 23M+ MAUs globally, and 85% of customers on the ad tier are streaming for 2+ hours per day  —  Netflix is seeing strong growth of its advertising-based plan, having recently eclipsed 23 million global monthly active users, president of advertising Amy Reinhard said.

item.title: 情報源OpenAIはCNNおよびFox Corp.と、テキスト、ビデオ、画像コンテンツのライセンス交渉中。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: OpenAI is in talks with CNN and Fox Corp. to license their text, video, and image content; Time “is in discussions with OpenAI” about a content deal  —  - Startup has said it's in discussions with dozens of publishers  — Negotiations come as OpenAI faces New York Times lawsuit

item.title: メモアマゾン・スタジオの責任者ジェニファー・サルケが、最近のレイオフはアマゾン・スタジオとMGMの劇場配給チームを統合する計画の一環だと語った（Deadline）。
item.description:
Deadline:
Memo: Amazon Studios Head Jennifer Salke says recent layoffs were part of its plan to consolidate the Amazon Studios and MGM theatrical distribution teams  —  EXCLUSIVE: Earlier this morning, Amazon revealed that it was laying off several hundred employees across Prime Video and Amazon Studios as part of a review of its business.

item.title: 情報源WPPは市場調査事業カンターの株式40％から撤退する選択肢を検討中、WPPは2019年にカンターの60％をバイアウト会社ベイン・キャピタルに売却（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: WPP is considering options to exit its 40% stake in market-research business Kantar; WPP sold 60% of Kantar to buyout firm Bain Capital in 2019  —  - Kantar could be valued about £7 billion in a transaction  — WPP sold a majority stake in Kantar to PE firm Bain in 2019

item.description:
Michael M. Grynbaum / New York Times:
Donald Trump appeared in his first live Fox News interview in nearly two years; sources say Trump thinks Fox erred in settling with Dominion  —  A town hall in Iowa on Wednesday is the network's first live interview with the former president in nearly two years, the latest twist in a long-running drama.

item.title: Luminateの2023年レポート：世界の音楽業界は2023年に4Tストリームを突破、新記録で前年比34%増、米国ではテイラー・スウィフトが78ストリームに1ストリームを占める（Maria Sherman/Associated Press）
item.description:
Maria Sherman / Associated Press:
Luminate's 2023 report: the global music industry passed 4T streams in 2023, a new record and up 34% YoY; Taylor Swift accounted for one in every 78 US streams  —  Listened to more music last year?  You're not alone.  —  The global music industry surpassed 4 trillion streams in 2023 …

item.title: Twitchのダン・クランシーCEO、2023年3月の人員削減後、500人以上（従業員の〜35%）を削減する計画を確認、従業員は事業規模に対して過剰だったと語る（The Verge
item.description:
The Verge:
Twitch CEO Dan Clancy confirms plans to cut 500+ jobs, or ~35% of its staff, and says its workforce was oversized for its business' size, after March 2023 cuts  —  Twitch is laying off more than 500 employees, Twitch CEO Dan Clancy announced this morning, reportedly accounting for around 35 percent of its staff.
